Brain Tumor Segmentation BraTS 2020 Dataset

The document excerpt describes the Brain Tumor Segmentation BraTS 2020 Dataset, which involves segmenting gliomas in pre-operative MRI scans. The dataset requires labeling each pixel as part of a tumor area (1 or 2 or 3) or not (0). The sub-regions considered for evaluation are the enhancing tumor (ET), tumor core (TC), and whole tumor (WT). The provided segmentation labels have values of 1 for NCR & NET, 2 for ED, 4 for ET, and 0 for everything else.
